I don't know if this is a glitch or not, but clicking on my name to see what post you're responding to just takes me to the top of the last page. So I have no idea what to respond to.[/bq]That happens on this thread when someone replies to a post near the top (i.e. first ~5 posts) of the page. If that happens to you, just hit next page and look near the top for a comment by that person; if there are several near the top, try to find the one that looks most relevant.

Also, I think someone mentioned earlier how they had a 2 MB/s download speed
Bitch please I have like 350 KB/s (2.8 Mb/s)
